name: Md. Bazar Bhorai Development Society
briefDescription: MAIN AIM OF THIS ORGANIZATION IS MINORITY, TRIBAL AND OTHERS BACKWARD CLASS SOCIAL, ECONOMIC, CULTURAL, EDUCATIONAL AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT. We want to form a Tribal Football Team, teach free computer education for tribal students and to form a band party on tribal culture. We want to arrange training for tribal youths and girls for self development. In this way the tribal students will flourish in future. We have no such place to conduct this training sessions, now the training classes of Bhorai are conducted at the unused shed of Md. Bazar Kishan Mandi. Some programmes have also been arranged for reducing child marriage from tribal community. Now 342 tribal students have been engaged in training of folk dance and song by expert artists under Bhorai.
